results.content:
I have tried creating chatbot with various platforms including amazon lex and ibm watson, and just took azure as for trial.

But there are some benefits of using micorsoft's cloud platform that is well understood by a xamarin developer- u got more flexibility and control over multiple environments be it android, windows or ios.
results.content_html:
I have tried creating chatbot with various platforms including amazon lex and ibm watson, and just took azure as for trial.

But there are some benefits of using micorsoft's cloud platform that is well understood by a xamarin developer- u got more flexibility and control over multiple environments be it android, windows or ios.

results.content:
a tutorial with practical approach, examples are vital if one want to develop a serious and functional chat bot application or any other app that involves one of various functionalities offered be it Language Understanding/LUIS or facebook chatbot that could be used in marketing and monetising  and idea or a simple web bot that can be embedded with a web or mobile application.
A lot of things are covered with intrinsic details with content up to mark.
results.content_html:

results.content: A very elaborate course on developing chatbot applications with azure. Practical projects on LUIS, qna, Facebook, simple, etc provide us opportunity to learn complete projects at one place.
results.content_html: A very elaborate course on developing chatbot applications with azure. Practical projects on LUIS, qna, Facebook, simple, etc provide us opportunity to learn complete projects at one place.

results.content: Nice tutorial on chat bot development on cloud with ease and power. Various kinds of chatbots with practical exercises are explained.
results.content_html: Nice tutorial on chat bot development on cloud with ease and power. Various kinds of chatbots with practical exercises are explained.
